message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1200000. I believe this price is fair, considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts.

I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I'm willing to pay.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900000 is still significantly below what I believe the product is worth.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I'm proposing a final price of $1000000. This is a fair compromise that reflects both our interests. If this doesn't work, I will have to consider other options.

I understand that you're willing to come down a bit, but $1000000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a counteroffer of $950000. I think this is a fair compromise that takes into account both our interests.
